original_text: When the angels went away from them into heaven, the shepherds said to one another, “Let us go over to Bethlehem and see this thing that has happened, which the Lord has made known to us.”
korean_text: 천사들이 떠나 하늘로 올라가니 목자가 서로 말하되 이제 베들레헴으로 가서 주께서 우리에게 알리신 바 이 이루어진 일을 보자 하고

sentences.original_text: When the angels went away from them into heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 천사들이 그들을 떠나 하늘로 올라갔을 때

sentences.original_text: the shepherds said to one another
Let us go over to Bethlehem
and see this thing that has happened
which the Lord has made known to us
